hero.introduction: Palak Gupta of the House of Ravenclaw, first of her name, loves to write, paint and code. Happy and a little bit of everything different.

projects.sub_header: Sometimes its the simple joys like indulging into arts, drinking lots of coffee, reading a  book and listening to good music that can be such incredible healing. Well, I found mine :)
projects.sub_sub_header: Take a look at my work!

contact.sub_header: If you're interested in showcasing your work on this platform, fill out the form below and I will get back to you right away!
